dy_num.componentleveltooltip: Number of units currently available in Amethyst Unit pool.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: # yeah this is a big old hack, will need to fix it later # (k = RitualsList.FirstContext.RitualContext.Key, o = k.Substr(0, k.Length - 1) + "cap") => { PlayersFaction .AvailableRitualList("DON_AMETHYST_ARMORY_UNITS") .FirstContext(RitualContext.Key == o) }
